yahtzee

Class YLogic.roundData

  • java.lang.Object
    • yahtzee.YLogic.roundData
  • Enclosing class:
    YLogic

    public class YLogic.roundData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class records all useful user data over the course of a game. Data recorded is easily accessed and can be easily presented back to the user. The idea was to have game stats ready for the user so they can focus more on the game and not have to worry about the technicalities or recording the stats themselves. The idea was also a way to help the develop bug-test and score-test the logic of the game class.
